title: Special Preview - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress - What Is In Store For The Futures of Deshaun Watson and J.J. Watt? Plus, Shawne Merriman!
itunes:title: Special Preview - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress - What Is In Store For The Futures of Deshaun Watson and J.J. Watt? Plus, Shawne Merriman!
description:
LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress talk about the real reason that J.J. Watt wanted out of Houston and what is in store for Deshaun Watson moving forward. Tom Brady turned into a completely different human being at the Buccaneers’ celebration parade but it was great to see the G.O.A.T. let loose! Plus, 3x Pro Bowl linebacker and host of the Lights Out podcast Shawne Merriman stops by to remember the late Marty Schottenheimer!  


Subscribe, rate and review Up On Game today!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/up-on-game/id1542652485

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
